alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 15 at 6:19PM CDT until September 16 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kansas... Cimarron River Near Forgan 8NNE affecting Meade County. For the Cimarron River...including Forgan 8NNE...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Cimarron River Near Forgan 8NNE. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Expect minor overflows of low lying banks along the Cimarron River in southern Meade County on downstream into Oklahoma. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 3.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 4.7 feet this evening. - Action stage is 4.0 feet. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 615 AM CDT.
